about_the_game:
The Servonauts Artbook is your exclusive ticket to space travel! 

Featuring over 100 pages, this artbook unveils how the interstellar gas station came to life. 

From concept art, through the wildest places you could ever imagine, over to the Servonauts you meet every time when your space car runs out of fuel. Oh, that’s about you though, you’re the Servo. Well, let’s call that part an autobiography then.

From the first scribbles to the final touches, this artbook has it all!
So open it up and explore the universe! 

Whether you're a fan of game art, curious about design, or just love the Servonauts universe, this artbook is a must-have! 🚀✨
